about_the_game:
WELCOME TO OPERATION SIEGE

Operation Siege is an online multiplayer tactical FPS based on air combat, ground combat, with a selection of realistic faction-specific weapons and vehicles allow players to build their own loadout for their preferred tactics. Experience the war by being a commander and perform airstrike operations to eliminate the enemy team and supply your team with various of supply kits.


Explore six massive maps with the traditional game modes Conquest, Team Deathmatch, Rush, and lastly special game mode Operation Siege.

KEY FEATURES

  • Play to your strengths — With 4 classes: Assault, Engineer, Support, Recon — each have the specialties.
  • Hit the battlefield with up to 64 players — By featuring two armies US Force, Russia Force. — With upcoming Forces in the future.
  • Customize your loadout — With a selection of faction-specific weapons and vehicles for your preferred tactics.
  • Explore the environments with variation of game modes — By actions divided into main objectives.
  • Be the commander — And help your team by performing airstrike operations and supplying your team with a various of supply kits.
